def find_smallest_failed_test_case_size(test_cases):
    results = []
    for test_case in test_cases:
        N = test_case['']
        S = test_case['S']
        V = test_case['V']
        failed_sizes = [S[i] for i in range(N) if V[i] == '0']
        results.append(min(failed_sizes))
    return results

def find_smallest_failed_test_case_size(test_cases):
    results = []
    for test_case in test_cases:
        N = test_case['N']
        S = test_case['S']
        V = test_case['V']
        failed_sizes = [S[i] for i in range(N) if V[i] == '']
        results.append(min(failed_sizes))
    return results
